AttributeDefinition.name: AttributeDefinition
AttributeDefinition.description: Represents a product, asset, or object attribute, for example, a hardware specification or software detail.

Code.description: Code for the attribute definition. This field is unique within your organization.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: Available only if the multicurrency feature is enabled. Contains the ISO code for any currency allowed by the organization.

DataType.description: The data type of the attribute definition.

DefaultHelpText.description: The default help text for this attribute.

DefaultValue.description: The default value for this attribute.

DeveloperName.description: The unique name of the attribute definition record.

IsActive.description: Indicates that the attribute definition is active. Active attributes definitions can be selected for products.

IsRequired.description: Indicates whether the attribute definition is required for a product.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date the attribute definition was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date the attribute definition was last viewed.

OwnerId.description: The owner of the attribute definition.

PicklistId.description: The ID of the attribute picklist with the valid values for this attribute.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The identifier of the attribute definition in an external system.

ValueDescription.description: The default value description for this attribute.
